1.0.0
Added a placeholder song, no textures.
Added keybinds: A - Left | S - Up | K - Down | L - Right.
Added a random note generator.
Added a note recording system; press record, and all your next keys pressed will be saved to an array to then play once you stop recording, allowing for PERFECT synchronization.
